pictures.title: Yard cat looking into your eyes
Smiling girl with green hair
pictures.quote: A good snapshot stops a fleeting moment.

pictures.title: Delicate daisies
pictures.quote: Photos keep secrets, just like people.

pictures.title: Closeup photo of a sandy beach
pictures.quote: Photos are evidence that we lived.

pictures.title: Coffee with beautiful foam in a turquoise cup
pictures.quote: I didn't choose a photo. It chose me.
